notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, A.C.B. and A.-V.D.B.; methodology, R.-M.D., B.F.; software, A.C.B.; validation, A.C.B., A.-V.D.B. and B.F.; formal analysis, A.C.B.; investigation, A.C.B., R.-M.D., B.F., F.M., G.C.; resources, R.-M.D., B.F., C.V.; data curation, F.M., G.C.; writing—original draft preparation, A.C.B., A.-V.D.B.; writing—review and editing, A.C.B., A.-V.D.B., R.-M.D., B.F., F.M., G.C.; visualization, F.M., G.C.; supervision, B.F., R.-M.D.; project administration, R.-M.D.; funding acquisition, F.M., G.C., C.V. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
